ingredients: 3 kaffir lime leaves, snipped into slivers with scissors (discard stem), OR 1 tsp. lime zest
3 kaffir lime leaves, snipped into slivers with scissors (discard stem), OR 1 tsp. lime zest
1/2 to 1 fresh red chili, minced, OR 1/8 tsp. dried crushed chili
1+3/4 cups Panko or regular breadcrumbs, OR see below for gluten-free substitute*
approx. 1 cup oil for frying (I like peanut)
To serve: fresh coriander for garnish and Thai sweet chili sauce for dipping, available at most supermarkets. To make your own with my Thai Sweet Chili Sauce Recipe
